```{r setup, include=FALSE}
.libPaths(Sys.getenv("R_LIBS_USER"))

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# detach all libraries

detachAllPackages <- function() {
  basic.packages <- c("package:stats", "package:graphics", "package:grDevices", "package:utils", "package:datasets", "package:methods", "package:base")
  package.list <- search()[ifelse(unlist(gregexpr("package:", search()))==1, TRUE, FALSE)]
  package.list <- setdiff(package.list, basic.packages)
  if (length(package.list)>0)  for (package in package.list) detach(package,  character.only=TRUE)
}
detachAllPackages()

# function to load libraries

pkgTest <- function(pkg){
  new.pkg <- pkg[!(pkg %in% installed.packages()[,  "Package"])]
  if (length(new.pkg)) 
    install.packages(new.pkg,  dependencies = TRUE)
  sapply(pkg,  require,  character.only = TRUE)
}

# knitr

knitr::knit_hooks$set(output = function(x, options){
  if(!is.null(options$max_height)){
    paste('<pre style = "max-height:', options$max_height, '; float: left; width: 910px; overflow-y: auto;">', x, "</pre>", sep = "")
  }else{
    x
  }
  
})

# loading packages 
lapply(c("tidyverse"),pkgTest)
lapply(c("readr"),pkgTest)
lapply(c("paletteer"),pkgTest)
lapply(c("kableExtra"),pkgTest)
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(paletteer)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
options(width = 60)
local({
  hook_output <- knitr::knit_hooks$get('output')
  knitr::knit_hooks$set(output = function(x, options) {
    if (!is.null(options$max.height)) options$attr.output <- c(
      options$attr.output,
      sprintf('style="max-height: %s;"', options$max.height)
    )
    hook_output(x, options)
  })
})
```

### Importing Data  

```{r}
# setwd("/Users/kdlee/Desktop/MIAU-exer-FA")

Community_Overall <- read_csv("Com_Overall_FA.csv")

Community_Negative <- read_csv("Com_Neg_FA.csv")

MTurk_Overall <- read_csv("MTurk_Overall_FA.csv")

MTurk_Positive <- read_csv("MTurk_Pos_FA.csv")

MTurk_Negative <- read_csv("MTurk_Neg_FA.csv")
```

### Compiling Data 

```{r, results='asis'}
Merge1 <- merge(Community_Overall, Community_Positive, by = "Item_No", all.x = TRUE)

Merge2 <- merge(Merge1, Community_Negative, by = "Item_No", all.x = TRUE)

Merge3 <- merge(Merge2, MTurk_Overall, by = "Item_No", all.x = TRUE)

Merge4 <- merge(Merge3, MTurk_Positive, by = "Item_No", all.x = TRUE)

Merge5 <- merge(Merge4, MTurk_Negative, by = "Item_No", all.x = TRUE)

Merge6 <- merge(Merge5, SMU_Overall, by = "Item_No", all.x = TRUE)

Merge7 <- merge(Merge6, SMU_Positive, by = "Item_No", all.x = TRUE)

Final_DF <- merge(Merge7, SMU_Negative, by = "Item_No", all.x = TRUE)
```
